hoon.serialization

Class HoOnMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • hoon.serialization.HoOnMessage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HoOnQuery, HoOnResponse

    public abstract class HoOnMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a HoOn message header and performs wire serialization/deserialization
    Version:
    1.0 21 March 2017
    Author:
    Qiannan Wu

      • checkVersion

        Check if the first byte contains the correct version
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        It returns true if the version is correct; otherwise false

      • checkHeader

        public static boolean checkHeader(byte firstByte,
                                  int errorCodeValue)
                           throws HoOnException
        check if the first 2 byte of the header is correct
        Parameters:
        firstByte - the first byte of the header
        errorCodeValue - the value of error code
        Returns:
        It returns true if it passes the check
        Throws:
        HoOnException - if there are errors in the header

      • decode

        public static HoOnMessage decode(byte[] buffer)
                          throws HoOnException,
                                 java.io.IOException
        Deserialize HoOn Message header.
        Parameters:
        buffer - bytes from which to deserialize
        Returns:
        Deserialized HoOn message
        Throws:
        HoOnException - if deserialization or validation fails
        java.io.IOException - if I/O exception
